fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
On nights 3, 6, 9, etc., shock a player, dealing a Basic Attack to them, whoeever they visit, whoever that person visits, and so on until either the final target is one that loops back into the cycle, visited no one, or visited you.
If one of your victims is a role that grants protection, you will ignore the effect that they gave to their target.
